text: The Roraiman barbtail (Roraimia adusta) is a species of bird in the Furnariidae family. It is placed in the monotypic genus Roraimia. It is found in Brazil, Guyana, and Venezuela. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist montane forests. ==References== * BirdLife International 2004. Roraimia adusta. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 27 July 2007. Category:Tyranni Category:Birds of South America
title: Roraiman barbtail
